      • enterDoor

        public void enterDoor(Game game)
               throws InterruptedException
        if haskey == true, enterDoor will cause endround, so the game can continue to the next round or go to the victory screen. Otherwise, this method won't cause anything.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
